snippet.title: Worms W.M.D - Wonderful Multiplayer Destruction!
snippet.description:
Add Worms W.M.D to your Steam Wishlist - http://bit.ly/WormWMD

The new trailer released today celebrates the classic, multiplayer gameplay with a fresh new twist. For the first time ever players will be able to use exciting new vehicles, such as tanks and helicopters, and even enter buildings! These all add new strategic elements of gameplay to the traditional wormy warfare. You'll be able to dive into the extensive single player modes or compete in crazy multiplayer with local couch co-op and online modes supporting up to 6 players with up to 8 worms each.

Play multiplayer your way with:

- Local Play
- Online Multiplayer
- Quick Match
- Lobby Browser
- Ranked Matches
- Unranked Matches
- Custom Games

Worms W.M.D will be launching on PC, Xbox One & PlayStation 4 later this year.

Team17, founded in 1990, are a fully independent Video Game Developer and Games Label, responsible for the Worms™ series, Beyond Eyes, Sheltered and  many more. Ensure you never miss out on our latest videos by subscribing to us now: bit.ly/SubTeam17

Don't forget you can also
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WormsTeam17/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WormsTeam17
